title: Managed Files

fields.name: File name
fields.autoIconHint: Show icon based on file extension

selectExistingHint: Auto-fills name and creates initial deployment if inside a git repo
selectFolderHint: All files in the folder will be managed as a single bundle
selectMultipleHint: Select individual files to manage as a single bundle
selectFileOrFolderHint: Click to browse or drag and drop files / folders here
noRepoDetected: No git repo detected â€” deployment will need to be added manually
willCreateDeployment: An initial deployment will be created automatically with the detected git repo and file path.

delete.title: Delete file
delete.warning: This will permanently remove the file from the application. All version history and commits will be lost.
delete.deploymentsHint: Choose whether to also delete deployed files from disk for each deployment:

messages.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this file? All associated deployments and commits will also be removed.
messages.noFiles: No managed files yet. Create one to get started.
